title: Color Harmony Pathfinder
description: A puzzle game where you find paths between colors based on harmonic relationships (shades, analogous, complementary). Test your color sense!

changes: Initial beta release: Core gameplay, 3 levels (shades, analogous, complementary), refined UI/UX, mobile responsive.

features: Multiple levels with different color harmony rules (shades, analogous, complementary)
Responsive design for desktop and mobile
